mapper.select: SELECT users.id,users.name,COUNT(users.seq) AS 'count' FROM team,plan_by_user,users WHERE team.seq = plan_by_user.team_seq AND plan_by_user.user_seq = users.seq AND CODE = #{code} AND state='YES' GROUP BY users.id

SELECT u.id,u.name,COUNT(l.seq) AS 'count' FROM todo_list l,plan_by_user p,team t,users u WHERE l.plan_by_user_seq = p.seq AND p.team_seq = t.seq AND u.seq = l.user_seq AND l.state = 'YES' AND t.code = #{code} GROUP BY u.id

SELECT users.id,users.name,COUNT(users.seq) AS 'count' FROM team,plan_by_user,users,todo_list WHERE team.seq = plan_by_user.team_seq AND plan_by_user.user_seq = users.seq AND plan_by_user.seq = todo_list.plan_by_user_seq AND CODE = #{code} AND todo_list.ing = 'YES' AND todo_list.state='YES' GROUP BY users.id;
